meanings.definition: Most distant in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The farthermost star in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: The cabin at the farthermost edge of the forest was peaceful and secluded.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led the pirates to the farthermost island, but all they found was a coconut.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the farthermost reaches of the universe, infinite and unreachable.
meanings.sent5: The farthermost memories of childhood lingered in the old photo album.

meanings.sent1: The farthermost point of the journey was marked by a tall lighthouse.
meanings.sent2: His patience was tested to the farthermost limit by the noisy neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The farthermost slice of cake was saved for the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: The impact of her words reached the farthermost corners of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The farthermost boundaries of the kingdom were guarded by brave knights.
